title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Women's Singles Results
text: May 9, 2018 / 8:44 PM / Updated 16 hours ago UPDATE 2-ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Women's Singles Results Reuters Staff 1 Min Read May 10 (OPTA) - Results from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Women's Singles matches on Wednesday .. 3rd Round .. 1-Simona Halep (ROU) beat Kristyna Pliskova (CZE) 6-1 6-4 6-Karolina Pliskova (CZE) beat 9-Sloane Stephens (USA) 6-2 6-3 14-Daria Kasatkina (RUS) beat 3-Garbine Muguruza (ESP) 6-2 4-6 6-3 10-Petra Kvitova (CZE) beat Anett Kontaveit (EST) 6-7(4) 6-3 6-3 7-Caroline Garcia (FRA) beat 11-Julia Goerges (GER) 6-2 6-4 Carla Suarez Navarro (ESP) beat Bernarda Pera (USA) 2-6 6-2 6-4 Maria Sharapova (RUS) beat Kristina Mladenovic (FRA) 6-3 6-4 Kiki Bertens (NED) beat 2-Caroline Wozniacki (DEN) 6-2 6-2
